entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cold Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -34.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
